body:
I am getting the following error (running from LC/Quartz) when I try to install `SUNDIALS` using `develop` at commit `bc53bb9`.

```
==> Fetching https://computing.llnl.gov/projects/sundials/download/sundials-5.3.0.tar.gz

curl: (28) Connection timed out after 10001 milliseconds
==> Failed to fetch file from URL: https://computing.llnl.gov/projects/sundials/download/sundials-5.3.0.tar.gz
    Curl failed with error 28
==> Fetching from https://computing.llnl.gov/projects/sundials/download/sundials-5.3.0.tar.gz failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for spack-stage-sundials-5.3.0-ezvti26nbt3evp4gximaoygtrqd4dw6r
```

Hovering over the `SUNDIALS` link at https://computing.llnl.gov/projects/sundials/sundials-software shows the URL is accurate.  Clicking on that link in a web browser brings an Open/Save dialog box.
title: Installation issue: sundials `all fetchers failed` error
